org.ehcache.core.statistics

Interface TierStatistics


  • public interface TierStatistics
    All statistics relative to a tier

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Reset the values for this tier.
      long getAllocatedByteSize()
      How many bytes are currently allocated (occupied or not) for this tier
      long getEvictions()
      How many evictions occurred on the tier since its creation or the latest clear()
      long getExpirations()
      How many expirations occurred on the tier since its creation or the latest clear()
      long getHits()
      How many hits occurred on the tier since its creation or the latest clear()
      long getMappings()
      Number of entries currently in this tier
      long getMisses()
      How many misses occurred on the tier since its creation or the latest clear()
      long getOccupiedByteSize()
      How many bytes are currently occupied for this tier
      long getPuts()
      How many puts occurred on the tier since its creation or the latest clear()
      long getRemovals()
      How many removals occurred on the tier since its creation or the latest clear()

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        void clear()
        Reset the values for this tier. However, note that mapping, allocatedMemory, occupiedMemory won't be reset since it doesn't make sense.

        Implementation note: Calling clear doesn't really clear the data. It freezes the actual values and compensate for them when returning a result.

      • getHits

        long getHits()
        How many hits occurred on the tier since its creation or the latest clear()
        Returns:
        hit count

      • getMisses

        long getMisses()
        How many misses occurred on the tier since its creation or the latest clear()
        Returns:
        miss count

      • getPuts

        long getPuts()
        How many puts occurred on the tier since its creation or the latest clear()
        Returns:
        put count

      • getRemovals

        long getRemovals()
        How many removals occurred on the tier since its creation or the latest clear()
        Returns:
        removal count

      • getEvictions

        long getEvictions()
        How many evictions occurred on the tier since its creation or the latest clear()
        Returns:
        eviction count

      • getExpirations

        long getExpirations()
        How many expirations occurred on the tier since its creation or the latest clear()
        Returns:
        expiration count

      • getMappings

        long getMappings()
        Number of entries currently in this tier
        Returns:
        number of entries

      • getAllocatedByteSize

        long getAllocatedByteSize()
        How many bytes are currently allocated (occupied or not) for this tier
        Returns:
        number of bytes allocated

      • getOccupiedByteSize

        long getOccupiedByteSize()
        How many bytes are currently occupied for this tier
        Returns:
        number of bytes occupied
